title: IHC adjourns hearing of PTI founder in jail meeting case
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 9 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Tuesday held a hearing of a plea from the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaaf (PTI) founder seeking permission for meetings with party leaders without interference in jail.
Chief Justice of Islamabad High Court (IHC) Justice Aamer Farooq heard the case.
The report was submitted to the court by the Superintendent of Adiala Jail.
The PTI’s founder lawyer Shoaib Shaheen appeared before the court.
The court sought response from the interior departments of the Punjab government which could not be obtained so far and adjourned the hearing.
